<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3323</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Are you confused ?- Variations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sind Sie verwirrt? - Varianten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Êtes vous confus ? - Variations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É você confundido? - Variações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Siete confusi? - Variazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είστε συγκεχυμένοι; - Παραλλαγές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es usted confundido? - Variaciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a poem written by an English teacher, showing how confusing English can be.using the different pronounciation of simlarly spelled words, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Gedicht, das von einem englischen 
Lehrer geschrieben wird und zeigt wie verwirrende Englischdose 
be.using das unterschiedliche pronounciation der simlarly 
buchstabierten Wörter und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une poésie écrite par un professeur 
anglais, montrant comment le bidon embrouillant be.using de l'anglais 
le pronounciation différent des mots simlarly écrits, et davantage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um poema escrito por um professor inglês, 
mostrando como a lata desconcertante be.using do inglês o 
pronounciation diferente de palavras simlarly soletradas, e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un poem scritto da un insegnante inglese, 
mostrante come latta confusionaria be.using di inglese il 
pronounciation differente delle parole simlarly ortografate e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα ποίημα που γράφεται από έναν 
αγγλικό δάσκαλο, που επιδεικνύει πώς τα συγχέοντας αγγλικά 
μπορούν be.using το διαφορετικό pronounciation των simlarly
συλλαβισμένων λέξεων, και περισσότερο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un poema escrito por un profesor inglés, 
mostrando cómo la lata confusa be.using del inglés el diverso 
pronounciation de palabras simlarly deletreadas, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pronounciation</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
